item.title: Eightco Jumps 3,000% on Worldcoin Treasury Pivot, Ives Role
item.description: For much of the past three years, Eightco Holdings Inc. was little more than a penny stock. On Monday, all that changed, as the e-commerce company soared over 3,000% after announcing a plan to buy dig
